prompt: Chiikawastyle,Usagi,This is a digital drawing in a cute, cartoon style featuring a character named Usagi. Usagi is an anthropomorphic, cream-colored bunny with large, expressive eyes, pink blush marks on her cheeks, and long, upright ears with pink inner fur. She has a small, round nose and a gentle, smiling expression. Usagi is holding a string of white flowers in her paws, which are positioned at the bottom right of the image. The background is a soft blue sky with a few white clouds, adding to the cheerful and whimsical atmosphere. The image is simple and charming, with clean lines and a pastel color palette.
